home.metaTitle: Tricare | Ingredient Sourcing for Global Health Manufacturing
home.title: Trusted ingredient sourcing for global health manufacturing.
home.subtitle: We connect global suppliers with production teams — focusing on production-ready sourcing and technical fit.

quickFacts.title: Documentation-driven sourcing
quickFacts.text: Every ingredient is vetted against strict documentation standards before it reaches your facility.

quickFacts.title: Production-aware evaluation
quickFacts.text: We assess physical properties to ensure seamless integration into your manufacturing lines.

quickFacts.title: Regulatory alignment
quickFacts.text: Full compliance verification across global markets including TGA, FDA, and FSanz standards.

mission.description: Tricare sources ingredients for health and nutrition manufacturing. We focus on how materials perform in production — not just on paper specifications.

categories.intro: We focus on ingredients used across modern nutrition and health manufacturing — where quality, consistency, and production fit matter.

items.title: Whey Protein (WPI / WPC)
items.desc: High-clarity dairy protein for powders and ready-to-drink systems. Key: protein content, solubility, batch consistency.

items.title: Lactoferrin
items.desc: Purified, food-grade lactoferrin with clear batch documentation.

items.title: Sports Nutrition & Beverages
items.desc: Electrolytes and carbohydrate systems designed for instant solubility.

items.title: Amino Acids
items.desc: USP / EP grade amino acids for nutrition manufacturing — consistency required.

items.title: Botanical Extracts
items.desc: Standardised extracts with defined active markers and documented processes.

compliance.header: Documentation is the starting point for every evaluation.

points.label: Batch Documentation Review
points.text: We review COA and SDS to confirm alignment with technical expectations.

points.label: Regulatory Alignment
points.text: We understand regulatory and GMP-related considerations relevant to health manufacturing.

points.label: Data Handling
points.text: Supplier technical information is handled via secure email. NDAs available on request.

insight.header: Ingredients are evaluated by their performance in production.
steps: Specification review — Assess particle size, moisture, solubility.
Production considerations — Evaluate behavior in blending and stability.
Fit-for-purpose sourcing — Recommend formats to reduce formulation risk.

contact.note: No file uploads on the site — please email COA/SDS to the address above.
